scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: An English translation of Gregory of Nyssa's (circa 335-394) Of the framing of man, a theological treatise concerning man's creation and nature. Seven leaves of text at the end are written in a different hand and inverted, containing a commentary on the Ten Commandments; these notes are identified as possibly being written by a former owner of the codex: Joseph Crouch.
